tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE car_maintenance_history (
    car_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_description TEXT,
    cost DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE car_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    car_model VARCHAR(50),
    mileage INT,
    engine_temperature FLOAT,
    coolant_level INT,
    oil_pressure FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    car_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_description TEXT,
    maintenance_cost FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE CarData (
    car_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model VARCHAR,
    year INT,
    mileage INT,
    last_maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceRecords (
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    car_id UUID references CarData(car_id),
    maintenance_type VARCHAR,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    mechanic_name VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE SensorsData (
    sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    car_id UUID references CarData(car_id),
    sensor_type VARCHAR,
    sensor_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Vehicle (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    make VARCHAR(255),
    model VARCHAR(255),
    year INT,
    last_maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceHistory (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id UUID REFERENCES Vehicle(id),
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(255),
    maintenance_date DATE,
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id UUID REFERENCES Vehicle(id),
    sensor_type VARCHAR(255),
    reading DECIMAL(10, 2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE PredictiveAnalysis (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id UUID REFERENCES Vehicle(id),
    analysis_type VARCHAR(255),
    prediction VARCHAR(255),
    confidence_level DECIMAL(10, 2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE CarData (
    car_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand VARCHAR(255),
    model VARCHAR(255),
    year INT,
    mileage INT
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    car_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    description VARCHAR(255),
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    car_id INT,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    reading DECIMAL(10, 2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE DiagnosticReports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    car_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    issue_description TEXT,
    repair_action TEXT
);
